name: Dratini

evolution.description: Dratini can evolve into Dragonair at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Dragon Pokémon. Long thought to be a myth, this Pokémon’s existence was only recently confirmed by a fisherman who caught one.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is affected by a negative status ailment, they can roll a d4 at the end of each of their turns. On a result of 4, they are cured.

abilities.name: Marvel Scale
abilities.description: This Pokémon's AC increase by 2 when suffering from a negative status condition.
